lifeGoals.title: Quit Smoking
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Gradually reduce nicotine intake; consider therapy or a support group; reward small weekly successes.

lifeGoals.title: Exercise
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Start with baseline, pick fun activities, ramp up gradually to build a lasting habit.

lifeGoals.title: Retirement
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Increase savings rate yearly, use tax-advantaged accounts, track progress annually.

lifeGoals.title: Start the RIA
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Outline your niche, register properly, set up compliance, then market effectively.

lifeGoals.title: Eat Better
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Replace processed foods, plan meals in advance, and keep a simple nutrition log.

lifeGoals.title: Buy a New Car
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Save for a down payment, compare loan rates, research reliable models, finalize best deal.

lifeGoals.title: Refinish Basement
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Gather multiple quotes, create a functional layout, keep a contingency fund for surprises.

lifeGoals.title: Clean Up Backyard
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Clear clutter, trim overgrowth, consider simple landscaping (mulch, raised beds).
